title: France' inflation slows in March, falls to 2.3%
description:
French inflation eased further in March as food, tobacco and energy prices slowed, official data showed Friday, fuelling hopes of interest rate cuts in coming months. People shop at an organic food seller in an open air market in Fontainebleau, south of Paris, France. (AP)

The annual rate fell to 2...

title: ECB rate cut likely in June, French central bank chief says
description:
The European Central Bank will lower borrowing costs in the spring, with June more likely than April for a first move, Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said.

“We will probably cut rates in spring, and spring in Europe is from April to June 21,” Villeroy said on France Info radio....
